licenseMutedText: The underlying skill, character, and game data is sourced from the 'uma-tools' project, which is distributed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.
creditsText:
This tool utilizes data and assets from several incredible community projects:
  • Core game data is sourced from the uma-tools project by Alpha123.
  • Character images are provided by Gametora.
  • Character affinity data is provided by Mee1080 from the UmaiShow project.
This tool would not be possible without their efforts.
thanksText: Thank you to Diabellstar and Sloovy for their help with testing and feedback.
